channel.title: [Pi] Npcs help [Pi]
channel.description: Hey guys, when you kill and npc, its hp just goes back to full, every npc is like that, the only way to kill them is if you can 1 hit kill them, I'm using the varrock scape base, can anyone help me?

item.title: [Pi] Npcs help [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @Da_Vein Da Vein
item.description:
@Da_Vein wrote:

Erm, go into the file that specificity the NPC’s hit-points and change that.

^Just ah educated guess.

Read full topic
